name: Principly, Inc.
description: Developer of an investment platform designed to guide college students to save money. The company's platform offers a simple, fast, and efficient way to create a college savings plan provides a link for family and friends to contribute easily, and allows for tax-free investment of savings, enabling parents and families to save smartly for their children's education and future.
one_liner: Developer of an investment platform designed to guide college students to save money. The company's platform offers a simple, fast, and efficient way to create a college savings plan provides a link for family and friends to contribute easily, and allows for tax-free investment of savings, enabling parents and families to save smartly for their children's education and future.
